title: Jg/devoured Vayne a bit OP atm.....
body:
So i know people will think this is crazy, but I played this for a while as a Vayne main, and honestly loved it , managed to carry on every game cause of the on hit and stuff,but this patch, with sated devoured, it became a bit too ridiculously op...
You cantankerous over pushed lanes by pushing them back towards your turret if they start running straight and condemn hem into the wall if they start escaping through bushes, but that isn't the strong part

With sated devourer's phantom hit, it procs a bit of her W, silver bolt, so basically her tank shred W activates every 2 hits instead of 3, which clearly should not be allowed as a full tank malphite with 5k Heath and 400 armor died in 8 hits.

Go check my match history with Vayne jg and you'll believe that I'm not bull shitting you.

replies.body: (the damage on vayne 2w also doubles as well as stacks less, now does 16% max hp + 120 or whatnot damage, + the 120 devourer, + the bork 16% current hp) not op at all
That is if they had two stacks before you autoed for the devourer proc
bugs then, cuz its doing double damage
If that's how it works, then that would be a bug.
(ikr) 2 aa is 1/2 the tanks hp, no armor pen needed

Look, its a huge boost to vayne but I just tried it in custom and even with 250 farm by 26 minutes (plus 6 kills and 0 deaths) I still didn't have 30 devourer stacks after rushing it second... it requires 2 dragons and a good 10 minuets of afk farming as jg vayne to pull this off but even then it sucks.

It is something to look out for if ever found viable
And cleaver
Correct! Lots of junglers are now running these two items in tandem {{champion:77}}  {{champion:56}} and {{champion:102}} to name the strongest ones i've seen.
Meaning the question should be, how the fuck were you allowed to get stacks as a vayne jungle?
You could simply take flash/smite as ADC vayne, pick up devourer as first/second item, and snowball through kills/dragons/camps to 30 stacks.
yeah if you want to get sated at like 35+ minutes maybe.

If you're confident enough in your laning skills, and can get at least 5 kills early, and you help clear dragon and then go after some jungle camps with a non farm jungler (lee sin, vi etc), you could be able to do it around 12-18 mins

Yeah let's not get a Vayne's core item.

That sounds like a great idea.

So now lets list in order reasons you don't want to do this.

1. Your giving up heal, you are now a combat summoner short on the enemy bot lane.
2. You can't realistically buy the item first on her, she struggles in lane (unless you outclass the enemy by a mile and then, simply buy BotRK and stomp sooner) taking away her sustain item is just going to hold her right back, and actually give the opposing laner a chance.
3. This means devourer is at 5k Gold to be able to start stacking, this is a huge problem, as buying it first generally leads a jungler to have devourer around the 17 minute mark, meaning you are looking at 30+ minutes to get this item done.
4. If your far enough ahead for this to be viable, it's twice as viable to just snowball and end the game and not risk a throw, your still only a vayne, 1 fuckup could be a throw, delaying your core power spike isn't helping anything.

I agree with wazza, her early game is the worst I know for an adc atm and buying trashy laning items like machete (plus losing heal for smite, lels are real) means you could die without a hope of fighting back (considering that her q scales off ad, which you don't get from devourer). No damage or sustain = no win

Ez, I just go Vayne jg, there problem solved
Not joking I actually do, can kite camps easily with the E and the percent health W rips through the camps like butter, just have to take it first
